system.description: The Dark Eldar has reached such mastery of pain that they can transcend physical limitations, becoming a nightmare made flesh.
system.benefit: If the character has gained at least 4 Pain Tokens during an encounter, they may spend a Fate Point to gain the Stuff of Nightmares Trait for the remainder of the encounter. Stuff of Nightmares: immune to Poison, disease, needing to breathe, most environmental hazards, bleeding, stunning, and any critical effect that would kill you if not dealt through a Psychic Power, Force Weapon, or Holy Attack. (Warning, while this does stop you from dying through most conventional means, it doesn't stop you being turned into a pile of broken limbs and meat).

prerequisites.text: Dark Eldar, Power Through Pain, Tormenter's Vigour

system.notes: Requires spending Fate Point and 4+ Pain Tokens

specialAbilities.name: Stuff of Nightmares
specialAbilities.description: Spend a Fate Point when you have 4+ Pain Tokens to become immune to poison, disease, suffocation, bleeding, stunning, and critical effects (except from psychic powers, force weapons, or holy attacks) for the rest of the encounter.
